summary: The 'Protect Railroads Against Illegal Looters Act' (Protect RAIL Act) aims to prevent theft from interstate or foreign shipments by carriers, particularly focusing on railroads. The bill amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make aliens involved in such offenses inadmissible to the U.S. and subject to deportation. It specifically targets individuals convicted of or admitting to crimes related to theft from shipments, referencing U.S. Code Title 18 Section 659.
